tutorial

		

import pathlib
from os.path import dirname, join, normpath
import Titaness

import time
import rich

this_directory = pathlib.Path (__file__).parent.resolve ()
this_module = str (this_directory)
the_guarantees = str (normpath (join (this_directory, f"guarantees")))

relative_path = str (normpath (join (this_directory, f"..")))

bio = Titaness.on ({
	"glob_string": this_module + "/**/guarantee_*.py",
	
	"simultaneous": True,
	"simultaneous_capacity": 10,

	"time_limit": 60,

	"module_paths": [
		normpath (join (this_module, "modules"))
	],

	"relative_path": relative_path,
	
	"aggregation_format": 2
})

bio ["off"] ()
scan = bio ["proceeds"]

rich.print_json (data = proceeds)

		
	

	
	

		
summary

		
		

			
glob_string

			
Anything found in the glob string is treated as a status check file.

		

		
		

			
simultaneous

			
A boolean that says if the checks should be run at the same time.

		

		
		

			
simultaneous_capacity

			
A limiter on the amount of checks that can be run at once.

		

		
		

			
time_limit

			
After the time_limit expires, checks fail.

			
This can prevent an infinite loop from barricading the presentation of results.
			
		

		
		

			
module_paths

			
These are added to the sys.path of every check.

		

		
		

			
relative_path

			
This path is removed from the path of each status check path in the "proceeds".

		

		
		

			
aggregation_format

			
This should be 2.  1 is outdated.
